summary: This document is an email chain from July 25, 2019, in which the USAO SDNY Criminal Division requests documents and photographs related to the investigation of an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The request is made to the correctional center, which requires a written request for the release of the investigative materials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the inmate involved in the July 23, 2019 incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center that is under investigation, as referenced in the document's request for related materials.

events.title: Incident Involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC
events.description: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, prompting an investigation.

events.title: USAO SDNY Request for Investigation Materials
events.description: The USAO SDNY Criminal Division sends a written request via email to the Metropolitan Correctional Center for all documents and photographs related to the investigation of the July 23 incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The USAO SDNY Criminal Division is actively investigating an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein that occurred on July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The investigation was still open as of July 25, 2019, and the requested materials were not to be disseminated further.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center required a written request, such as an email, from the USAO to release the investigation documents and photographs; a subpoena was not necessary.
Jeffrey Epstein's inmate registration number is listed as 76318-054.
